    Welcome to SWARM Simulation Platform

    This page provides an overview of the documentation that is offered!

    Tutorial

    Visit [Getting Started][mydoc_getting_started] to view a short tutorial on getting started with the platform and submitting your first simulation.

    Infrastructure

    Visit [Infrastructure][mydoc_infrastructure] to learn more about how the SWARM system runs your algorithm in the cloud.

    Algorithm Input Tool

    Visit [Algorithm Input Tool][mydoc_algorithm_input] to learn more about the tool created to create your algorithm and validate functionality before submitting.

    Features & Releases

    Visit [Features & Releases][mydoc_features] to view the features and release notes for this platform.
